messages.content: The future of our country is at stake. Vote Labour Thursday 12 December

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Rebuild the NHS, cut waiting times and end privatisation.
Give you the final say on Brexit.
Boost living standards and guarantee no tax increases for people earning less than £80,000 a year.
Deliver lower rents and bills by unrigging the economy to ensure fair treatment for private renters.
Kick-start a Green Industrial Revolution to tackle the climate crisis and create 1 million new jobs.
Labour is on your side. It's time for real change.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: The Lib Dems can't win here.
mentions.tacticalSituation: Only Labour can beat the Tories in this area. Voting for anyone other than Labour risks letting the Tories win.
